movie_title: ENGLISH SPEECH | RITIKA SINGH: Inspiring Message (English Subtitles)
introduction: Learn English with Ritika Singh. Ritika shares an inspiring message on how to be focused and overcom

vocabulary.example: I didn't have no homies. I was alone, and I had only one best friend.
Do not neglect studies, but then focus on what you're really, really good at.

vocabulary.definition: causing or feeling embarrassment or inconvenience
vocabulary.example: Because I don't know, the camera is on me. I get really awkward.

vocabulary.definition: drawn towards or interested in something
vocabulary.example: I know our age, 22, 23, 21, we get attracted towards things that are sort of negative.
Don't let that happen. Stay positive, always, and don't get demotivated by signals not working for you.

vocabulary.definition: an article or item carried or worn to complement a garment or outfit
vocabulary.example: Your body is your best accessory, so make sure you work on it every day.
